TopicTitle: Slow load time - unused network adapters disabled

Articles.Content:
Returned to play KSP with a fresh install, having the slow load issue when starting the game.

No unused network adapters active. [http://i.imgur.com/Auznz6w.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/Auznz6w.jpg)

Steam install path is "X:\Steam"

KSP install path is "C:\Games\SteamSSD\SteamApps\common\Kerbal Space Program" - not sure if this would be anything to do with the problem.

Not sure what else i can do, let me know what other info i can provide ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
Please see the stickies Varkolyn, we'll need your logs ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
